property.value: select * from (select rownum numrowasdf, adsfsds.* from ( select w.vc2mobile, l.numlisttype, decode(l.numlisttype, 0, '添加', 1, '退出') operate, to_char(l.datcreattime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') datcreattime, u.vc2username, t.vc2name from tl_log_bwlist l, tl_details_bwlist w, tl_products t, tl_user u where l.numlogid = w.numlogid and l.numprodid = t.numprodid and l.numuserid = u.numuserid and l.numlisttype in (0,1) #0# ORDER BY l.datcreattime DESC ) adsfsds where rownum < {0}+{1}+1) where numrowasdf > {0}

property.value: ALTER TABLE TL_USERGROUP_MEMBER ADD PARTITION P_{0} VALUES ({0}) TABLESPACE YXTEC_USERGROUP_MEMBER

property.name: queryLogDetail
queryLogDetailFailed
property.value: select VC2MOBILE,VC2STATE,VC2NAME from TLV_DETAILS_COLUMN where NUMLOGID ={0} and NUMSTATE <> 5 and NUMSTATE <> 6 and datcreatetime >(select trunc(datcreattime) from tl_log_column where numlogid ={0}) and datcreatetime < (select trunc(datcreattime) from tl_log_column where numlogid ={0})+1

property.name: queryLogDetailSuccess
property.value: select VC2MOBILE,VC2STATE,VC2NAME from TLV_DETAILS_COLUMN where NUMLOGID ={0} and (NUMSTATE = 5 or NUMSTATE = 6) and datcreatetime >(select trunc(datcreattime) from tl_log_column where numlogid ={0}) and datcreatetime < (select trunc(datcreattime) from tl_log_column where numlogid ={0})+1
